Aug. 27, 1900 D Rhos Contest
Rhos Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
rhos-contest
None
The Forest Queen
Llanerchrugog Park, Rhosllanerchrugog, Wrexham, Wales, UK March contest was also held, with the same result. Set march "Viking" by S. Lloyd Prizes: £7, £4, £2 Adjudicator originally entered as J. E. Fidler, but newspaper report on the contest gives Mr Fairhurst, of Crook Band, Wigan. Report in Wrexham Advertiser, 1st Sep 1900. 3 bands competed.
May 21, 2011, 3:27 p.m. April 5, 2020, 2:55 p.m.
1 Coedpoeth Public Edward Roberts
2 Ruabon Samuel Lloyd
3 Rhostyllen Charles Bennett
